description.narrative: AuchanSuper (Auchan), the supermarket arm of Groupe Auchan S.A. from France, a leading global food retailer and IFC strategic client, is planning to significantly expand its retail network in emerging markets over the next three years. The proposed transaction is a 250m debt and equity facility to finance (i) Auchans supermarket expansion in Russia, (ii) expansion in Vietnam, a new market and (iv) opening or expanding retail operations in countries in Eastern Europe, Asia, and Africa.

i) Affordable goods for lower to middle-income households: consumers will benefit from increased access to better quality and variety of products at lower prices. Auchan''s target is explicitly the lower bracket of the middle income class in urban areas. ii) Employment generation: Auchan''s projects will create significant local direct employment (with a significant portion of female employment) and in addition also indirect employment in the retail value chain. Typically a retail store creates approximately three full time positions for every 100 square meters of building area. iii) Expansion in second-tier cities and frontier regions: Auchan''s expansion will not only target large cities but also second-tier cities in frontier regions of countries such as Russia. iv) Best practice transfer: Auchan''s projects are expected to (a) facilitate the transfer of modern retail and management techniques, which allow lowering food prices without compromising the food quality, to the targeted regions and (b) enhance the efficiency of the supply chain in the countries and promote efficient logistic system. v) Impact on Food Safety: The expansion of modern food retail formats will contribute to food safety by improving supply chain efficiencies, and reducing food waste. The procurement of products locally sourced will generate backward linkages and encourage local producers to process according to best operating standards in terms of safety and quality.

mailing-address.narrative: AuchanSuper Philippe DELALANDE - CFO 94 rue Albert Calmette 78350 JOUY EN JOSAS France mailto:pdelalande@auchansuper.com Atak Sylvine Morin-Bouan - CFO Burevestnik office 3rd Ribinskaya street, building 18, entrance 22 107113 oscow RUSSIA mailto:smorin@ataksupermarket.ru

name.narrative: The first two subprojects are located in Russia and Vietnam. The future subprojects will be located in countries to be identified in due time, in Eastern Europe, Asia and Africa.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: Q-BA - Retail (Including Supermarkets, Grocery Stores, etc.)

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
